languages.text: {n}Взволнованный голос Вигдис из вокса отрывает вас от дел.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, мне жаль вас тревожить, но вы срочно нужны на мостике. Мне удалось объяснить, что врываться к вам в кабинет нельзя, но я не уверена сколько еще смогу продержаться..." {n}Прежде чем связь обрывается, вы слышите на заднем фоне чей-то возмущенный голос. Кажется, без вашего вмешательства и правда не обойтись.{/n}

{n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взволнованный голос Вигдис из вокса отрывает вас от дел.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, мне жаль вас тревожить, но вы срочно нужны на мостике. Мне удалось объяснить, что врываться к вам в кабинет нельзя, но я не уверена сколько еще смогу продержаться..." {n}Прежде чем связь обрывается, вы слышите на заднем фоне чей-то возмущенный голос. Кажется, без вашего вмешательства и правда не обойтись.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis's worried voice sounding from the vox distracts you from your business.{/n} "Lord Captain, I'm sorry to disturb you, but we need you at the bridge immediately. I managed to convince everyone not to break into your room, but I am not sure how long I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off you hear someone's upset voice in the background. Looks like your intervention is definitely necessary.{/n}

{n}Vigdis's worried voice sounding from the vox distracts you from your business.{/n} "Lord Captain, I'm sorry to disturb you, but we need you at the bridge immediately. I managed to convince everyone not to break into your room, but I am not sure how long I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off you hear someone's upset voice in the background. Looks like your intervention is definitely necessary.{/n}

{n}Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox distracts you from your business.{/n} "Lord Captain, I'm sorry to disturb you, but you are required at the bridge immediately. I managed to convince everyone to keep out of your cabin, but I am not sure how long I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you hear someone's irritated voice in the background. Indeed, looks like your intervention is necessary.{/n}

{n}Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox distracts you from your business.{/n} "Lord Captain, I'm sorry to disturb you, but you are required at the bridge immediately. I managed to convince everyone to keep out of your cabin, but I am not sure how long I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you hear someone's irritated voice in the background. Indeed, looks like your intervention is necessary.{/n}

{n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音阵中传来了维格迪斯担忧的声音，令你不得不从事务中抽身。{/n}“舰长大人，很抱歉打扰您，但您必须立即到舰桥上去。我设法说服他们不要进入你的房间，但我不知道还能拖延他们多久……”{n}传输中断之前，你听到隐约传来了有人怒气冲冲的声音。看起来，你确实有必要加以干涉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵中传来了维格迪斯担忧的声音，令你不得不从事务中抽身。{/n}“舰长大人，很抱歉打扰您，但您必须立即到舰桥上去。我设法说服他们不要进入你的房间，但我不知道还能拖延他们多久……”{n}传输中断之前，你听到隐约传来了有人怒气冲冲的声音。看起来，你确实有必要加以干涉。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|interrompu|interrompue} dans votre travail par la voix inquiète de Vigdis, qui s'élève du vox.{/n} « Excusez-moi de vous déranger, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais votre présence est requise de toute urgence sur la passerelle. J'ai réussi à les dissuader de débarquer à l'improviste dans votre cabine, mais je ne suis pas certaine de pouvoir les retenir encore bien longtemps... » {n}Avant la fin de la transmission, vous entendez la voix outragée de quelqu'un en arrière-plan. Il semblerait que votre intervention soit effectivement nécessaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|interrompu|interrompue} dans votre travail par la voix inquiète de Vigdis, qui s'élève du vox.{/n} « Excusez-moi de vous déranger, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais votre présence est requise de toute urgence sur la passerelle. J'ai réussi à les dissuader de débarquer à l'improviste dans votre cabine, mais je ne suis pas certaine de pouvoir les retenir encore bien longtemps... » {n}Avant la fin de la transmission, vous entendez la voix outragée de quelqu'un en arrière-plan. Il semblerait que votre intervention soit effectivement nécessaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du wirst von Vigdis' besorgter Stimme abgelenkt, die aus dem Vox-System ertönt.{/n}"Lord Captain, entschuldigt bitte die Störung, doch Ihr werdet dringend auf der Brücke benötigt. Ich konnte bisher alle davon abhalten, Euch in Eurem Arbeitszimmer zu behelligen, doch ich weiß nicht, wie lange ich sie noch fernhalten kann ..." {n}Bevor die Übertragung abbricht, hörst du im Hintergrund noch eine wütende Stimme. Dein Einschreiten ist wohl in der Tat unabdingbar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du wirst von Vigdis' besorgter Stimme abgelenkt, die aus dem Vox-System ertönt.{/n}"Lord Captain, entschuldigt bitte die Störung, doch Ihr werdet dringend auf der Brücke benötigt. Ich konnte bisher alle davon abhalten, Euch in Eurem Arbeitszimmer zu behelligen, doch ich weiß nicht, wie lange ich sie noch fernhalten kann ..." {n}Bevor die Übertragung abbricht, hörst du im Hintergrund noch eine wütende Stimme. Dein Einschreiten ist wohl in der Tat unabdingbar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La preocupada voz de Vigdis interrumpe tus pensamientos desde el voco.{/n} «Lord Capitán, lamento molestarle, pero su presencia es necesaria en el puente. Es urgente. He conseguido evitar que la gente irrumpa en su estudio, pero no sé cuánto tiempo podré contenerlos...». {n}Antes de que la transmisión se interrumpa, oyes una voz furiosa de fondo. Sí, parece que vas a tener que intervenir personalmente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La preocupada voz de Vigdis interrumpe tus pensamientos desde el voco.{/n} «Lord Capitán, lamento molestarle, pero su presencia es necesaria en el puente. Es urgente. He conseguido evitar que la gente irrumpa en su estudio, pero no sé cuánto tiempo podré contenerlos...». {n}Antes de que la transmisión se interrumpa, oyes una voz furiosa de fondo. Sí, parece que vas a tener que intervenir personalmente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスから聞こえるヴィグディスの心配そうな声に、気を取られた。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、お邪魔して申し訳ありませんが、至急ブリッジにお越しいただく必要があります。人々があなたの書斎に押し掛けないように、なんとか食い止めてきましたが、いつまで持つか分かりません…」{n}通信が切れる前に、誰かの怒りの声が聞こえた。どうやら、あなたの介入が必要なようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスから聞こえるヴィグディスの心配そうな声に、気を取られた。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、お邪魔して申し訳ありませんが、至急ブリッジにお越しいただく必要があります。人々があなたの書斎に押し掛けないように、なんとか食い止めてきましたが、いつまで持つか分かりません…」{n}通信が切れる前に、誰かの怒りの声が聞こえた。どうやら、あなたの介入が必要なようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vigdis'in vokstan gelen endişeli sesi, dikkatini dağıtıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim ama acilen köprüye gelmeniz gerekiyor. Odanıza dalmalarını engelledim ama onları daha ne kadar tutabilirim bilmiyorum..." {n}İleti kesilmeden önce arka plandan öfkeli birinin sesi yükseliyor. Anlaşılan o ki sahiden köprüye gitmen gerekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are distracted by Vigdis's worried voice coming from the vox.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise for disturbing you, but your presence is urgently required on the bridge. I managed to stop everyone from barging into your study, but I am not sure how much longer I will be able to hold them back..." {n}Before the transmission cuts off, you catch someone's outraged voice in the background. Indeed, it appears that your intervention is necessary.{/n}
